item.title: Wordpress Class One
item.description: Discussed subject Frontend Backend programming language How to installed wordpress Rule and regulation make a excel file for daily 4 hours time keeping. Column will be following Name (first row) SI (starting from 4th row, first column) title description start time (video) end time (video) spend time resource link post done (yes/no; whether I have posted on 2 facebook post in wordpress learning bangladesh page or not) comment (Yes/No) Whenever practicing wordpress write mamurjor shibu dev polo start time in skype group.
